name: Drones (7DFPS)
description:
A multiplayer arena shooter featuring robotic drones fighting in a zero-gravity environment; made in 7 days for the 7DFPS game jam. You view the world through a thermal camera, shooting raises your temperature and makes you easier to spot - so shoot with care.

The move-to-tile mechanic means the game can be played entirely with a mouse, standard WASD controls are included but aren't essential to play the game.

Technically the levels are randomly generated, but I didn't get a chance to develop it very much so while there are technically thousands of level variations they are admittedly very, very similar.

Code/2D Art: @DesignerBradley
Models/Music: @MattMakesThings

CONTROLS

Mouse : Look around
Left Mouse Button : Shoot (hold down to snipe)
Right Mouse Button : Travel to highlighted tile
WASD : Move Forward/Left/Back/Right
M : Mute music

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS

1. Extract all contents of the .zip file onto your hard drive
2. Run the executable/app
